channel.title: jsdoc on Book
channel.description: Recent content in jsdoc on Book

item.title: better-docs
item.description: Better Docs @category plugin usage ... "tags": { "allowUnknownTags": ["category"] //or true }, "plugins": [ "node_modules/better-docs/category" ], ... /** * Class description * @category Category * @subcategory All */ class YourClass { .... } @component plugin Installation instructions ... "tags": { "allowUnknownTags": ["component"] //or true }, "plugins": [ "node_modules/better-docs/component" ], ... # if you use npm npm install -g parcel-bundler # or yarn yarn global add parcel-bundler Usage /** * Some documented component * * @component */ const Documented = (props) => { const { text } = props return ( <div>{text}</div> ) } Documented.

item.title: Basic
item.description: Basic Variable /** * Variable de prueba * @type {string} */ const xample = "Algun valor"; Array /** * Ejemplo con array * @type {Array<string|number>} */ const arrey = ['hola','como estas?',2]; Module /** * Calculator module - See * @module Button */ Tutorials Vincular a tutorial /** * Calculator module - See {@tutorial calculator-tutorial} * @module calculator */ /** * Description * @class * @tutorial tutorial-1 * @tutorial tutorial-2 */ function MyClass() {} Custom Type /** * Una persona * @typedef {Object} Estudiante * @property {number} edad - La edad * @property {string} nombre - El nombre */ /** * @type {Estudiante} */ const Estudiante = { edad: 23, nombre: "Ramon" } Funcion /** * @description Hola que tal todo?
